check-error-online-body: Looks like your site is not online or available. This may occur if:
check-error-online-body-iscorrect: or you have entered a misspelled URL. Please make sure your site is correct: {{value}} Want to fix it?
check-error-online-body-isup: Your WordPress website is down or it is too slow to respond. Please check your site and retry
check-error-plugin-body:
We can't find the Worona Plugin installed in your site.

Our plugin lets you synchronize your WordPress site with our platform, please make sure it is installed and active.
